mapper.select: SELECT id, meeting_id, meeting_number, username, nickname, meeting_nickname, face_photos, meeting_start_time, create_time, update_time, meeting_delete FROM participants_person WHERE meeting_id =(SELECT meeting_id from participants_person where meeting_number=#{meetingNumber} ORDER BY meeting_start_time DESC LIMIT 1) AND meeting_nickname=#{nickname} AND meeting_delete=0;

SELECT meeting_nickname FROM participants_person p WHERE ( SELECT COUNT( 1 ) FROM sign s WHERE ( s.meeting_id = p.meeting_id AND s.sign_nickname = p.meeting_nickname ))= 0 AND meeting_id = #{meetingId};
